definitions: A breed of long-haired gun dog, typically white with brown or black markings, trained to stand rigid when scenting game.
A person or thing that sets something.
A person who sets type for printing.
A person who sets a task, test, or problem.
A player in volleyball who is responsible for setting the ball for an attacker.
examples: The English setter is a beautiful dog.
She is a setter of high standards.
The setter prepared the page for printing.
The exam setter made the questions challenging.
The setter perfectly placed the ball for the spike.
